system.description: You hide a chest and its contents on the Ethereal Plane. The chest can contain up to 1 cubic foot of material per caster level. You must touch the chest and a miniature replica (which you provide). The chest is hidden on the Ethereal Plane and can be recalled by you from anywhere on the same plane. Anyone other than you opening the chest is blasted with electricity (8d6 points, Reflex half). The chest has AC 7, 10 hit points, and hardness 5. If the chest is destroyed or the spell expires, the contents are lost. The replica is a focus; if it is lost or destroyed, the chest cannot be recalled. The spell lasts 60 days or until you recall the chest.

components.materialDescription: The chest and its replica, and 25 gp worth of jade dust (consumed).

system.target: One chest (up to 1 cu. ft./level) and the miniature replica
